texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Over the Christmas and New Year period, most of TfL public transport is open. However, planned works and service changes will affect public transport and road travel throughout the season. Most services are running normally today."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
See our Status updates map for Tube, Overground, TfL Rail, DLR and tram services for 23 December
There are changes and planned works on the following services today.
Limited regular bookings for today. Book your journey from Monday 9 December. Dial-a-Ride services are for registered members only.
Santander Cycles are available throughout the Christmas season, including today.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Cycle for free this Christmas. Make as many 30-minute journeys as you like within 24 hours free of charge. All our other services are planned to run normally.
